page.title: 15DAYS WE CELEBRATE-WALES TOWN
page.content: {BIRTHDAYS-}On the morning of your birthday you open your presents.In the afternoon or evening you might have a party with more presents and cards. There is lots of delicious food to eat. You have a birthday cake and usually the number of candles on it shows how old you are.The candles are lit and everyone sings "Happy birthday to you". When you have blown out the candles you think of a wish. {Chistmas Day-}On Chistmas day most children get up very early to open their presents and they start playing with them.For dinner you would have turkey,chicken or duck and stuffing with roast and mashed potatoes, vegetables such as sprouts,carrots, or cauliflower,yorkshire pudding a savoury sauce and gravy.For dessert you would have Christmas Pudding and white sauce with brandy or rum in it.
